desc: Wherever your next adventure takes you, take one of our unique rums with you. We have one of New Zealand's best Rum collections, including a range of unique tasting box options.

layout.text: Rum is everywhere, but the real rum – the proper rum, is hard to find. At Rum Runners, we want rum with history, some character, we want to hear its story and we’re on a mission to find exactly that.
